name: calls.participants.remove
desc: Registers participants removed from a Call.

users.desc: The list of users to remove as participants in the Call. [Read more on how to specify users here](/apis/web-api/using-the-calls-api#users).

errors.bad_users: At least one specified user is not part of the Call.
errors.inactive_call: The Call has been already ended.
errors.internal_error: An unexpected exception occurred while removing participants from the Call.
errors.user_not_found: At least one specified user wasn't found.
